name: Set of Two 26 1/2 Inch Japan Samurai Pu Foam Blade Anime Sword Ninja Katana, Play, Fencing, Fun, Birthday, Halloween
short_description: ✔ Authentic Samurai Aesthetic Each foam katana features a detailed handle, classic tsuba guard, and metallic-look blade, delivering a realistic Japanese-inspired design ideal for cosplay and collectors.

✔ Wakizashi Short Sword Design At an overall length of 26.5 inches, this set replicates the proportions of a traditional Wakizashi—the shorter companion blade carried by samurai as part of the classic Daishō pair. Perfect for dual-wield cosplay, samurai themes, and decorative display.

✔ Durable PU Foam Construction Made from high-density PU foam with an internal reinforced core, providing a safe, flexible, and long-lasting prop for cosplay, events, choreography, and themed performance.
✔ Perfect Dual Sword Set Includes two matching Wakizashi-style foam blades, ideal for ninja outfits, anime roleplay, fencing-style practice, stage props, and costume builds.

✔ Great Gift for Anime & Samurai Fans A stylish prop set for collectors, cosplay lovers, and anyone who enjoys Japanese culture. Great for birthdays, Halloween, Christmas, themed parties, conventions, and display collections. Recommended for ages 15+, Not a children’s toy
product_description: Experience the iconic look and feel of traditional Japanese katana style with this Set of Two 26.5-Inch Samurai PU Foam Blades. Designed for anime fans, ninja enthusiasts, and collectors, each sword features a lightweight yet durable foam blade and a detailed handle wrapping for an authentic appearance. Perfect for cosplay events, stage performance, fencing-style practice, themed parties, photoshoots, or as a unique holiday gift. Safe, flexible, and visually striking—great for completing your samurai-inspired outfit or display setup. Recommended for ages 15+, Not a children’s toy

name: Foam Dagger – 15” PU Short Foam Sword for LARP, Cosplay & Safe Play – Realistic Lightweight Roleplay Weapon
short_description: SAFE & DURABLE PU FOAM CONSTRUCTION – Crafted from high-density, soft PU foam for safe use in cosplay, stage combat, or mock battles. Ideal for teens and adults seeking safe fun.
REALISTIC DESIGN & DETAILING – Finely sculpted handles and metallic-like blades that look striking but remain completely safe for contact roleplay or costume use.
PERFECT FOR LARP & COSPLAY – A must-have accessory for fantasy, medieval, or assassin-themed characters. Great for conventions, costume parties, and theater props.
LIGHTWEIGHT & EASY TO CARRY – At just 15 inches long, each foam dagger is easy to handle, wear, or store. Great for kids, teens, or adults.
SIX FANTASY VARIANTS TO CHOOSE FROM – Black Steel, Golden Guard, Tactical Ninja, Savage Raider, Loki’s Legacy, and Braided Valor – each with its own distinctive flair.
product_description: Bring Fantasy to Life with Arleza Storm Foam Daggers Step into your next adventure with the Arleza Storm Foam Dagger – the perfect blend of safety, style, and fantasy for cosplay lovers, LARP enthusiasts, and roleplay fans of all ages. Crafted from high-density PU foam, these 15-inch daggers offer a realistic blade appearance without compromising on safety. Perfect for mock battles, stage props, and conventions, each dagger features unique styling to suit any character. Why Choose Arleza Storm? High-quality PU foam construction – safe, flexible, and durable Realistic detailing for authentic cosplay & LARP performance Lightweight design – easy to carry and wield Sold individually – perfect for collecting or pairing Available Designs: Black Steel – Classic knight-style with silver blade and black grip Golden Guard – Regal gold-accented handle for heroic builds Tactical Ninja – Futuristic angular blade with sleek black body Savage Raider – Rugged, serrated-edge design for brutal warriors Loki’s Legacy – Inspired by the trickster god, with ornate gold details Braided Valor – Bronze hilt with woven-style grip for noble fighters Unleash your inner warrior – safely and in style.

name: Liberty Imports 5 Pack Foam Swords and Weapons Set - 17 Inch Medieval Toy Swords, Axe, and Mace - Thick EVA Foam for Safe Play – Kids Pretend Battle Set for Knights, Ninja, and Viking Roleplay
short_description: Safe and Soft Play: Made from thick EVA foam with soft edges; designed for safe pretend battles and active play
Variety of Medieval Weapons: Set includes three swords, one axe, and one mace; ideal for imaginative roleplay and themed adventures
Lightweight and Easy to Hold: 17-inch foam weapons designed for small hands; comfortable grip for extended playtime
Great for Costumes and Roleplay: Perfect for dress-up, cosplay, Halloween, and themed parties; complements knight, ninja, and warrior outfits
Ideal for Parties and Gifts: A fun addition to birthday parties, playdates, and classroom activities; encourages interactive group play
product_description: Unleash the power of imagination with the 6-Pack Foam Swords & Weapons Set—the ultimate collection of medieval-inspired toys for kids who love epic roleplay and adventurous battles. This 17” foam sword set includes 3 swords, 1 axe, and 1 mace, all designed with thick EVA foam for soft, safe, and hours of fun playtime. Perfect for little knights, ninjas, and Vikings, these foam weapons are lightweight and easy to hold, making them ideal for children aged 3 and up. Crafted from durable EVA foam, each weapon in this set is designed with safety in mind. The foam material is soft yet sturdy, ensuring that your child can enjoy their pretend battle without the risk of injury. The soft edges protect against rough play, so parents can relax knowing their kids are safe while engaging in endless imaginative adventures. Whether your child is defending their kingdom, fighting off dragons, or embarking on a daring Viking quest, this foam weapons set will inspire hours of creative roleplay. The 3 unique foam swords, axe, and mace offer plenty of variety for different characters, giving your child the freedom to play as their favorite medieval hero or create a brand-new warrior persona. These foam toys are also perfect for Halloween costumes, birthday parties, or any themed events. Whether it's a knight, pirate, ninja, or viking, these foam weapons are the ideal accessory to complete their costume. Lightweight and easy to carry, children can easily take them to school, parties, or on outdoor adventures. Make your child’s playtime unforgettable with the 6-Pack Foam Swords & Weapons Set—a must-have for encouraging active play, creativity, and imagination. These soft foam weapons are not only fun but also provide a safe alternative to plastic or metal toys, making them an ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, and special occasions. Give your little warrior the perfect tools to defend their kingdom and embark on endless imaginary quests!

Costume Accessory & Display Prop: A versatile accessory for knights, medieval warriors, fantasy characters, and collectors seeking a realistic yet lightweight costume sword.
